entities.description: The time frame of the past 30 days, including today's date.
Indicates whether an offense was attempted or completed by the respondent.
Types of substances suspected to have been used by the offender, such as alcohol, computer equipment, or drugs/narcotics.
The person suspected of using substances like alcohol, computer equipment, or drugs/narcotics.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the time period of the past 30 days.
Indicates whether the respondent has attempted or completed an offense.
Specifies the type of substances the offender is suspected to have used.
